purpose: The email is a call for papers for the ESOP 2026 conference, inviting contributions on various aspects of programming language research. It outlines the submission categories, important dates for the two-round submission process, and the review process. The conference encourages submissions that bridge theory and practice and specifies formatting requirements for different types of contributions. Additionally, it mentions the opportunity for artifact evaluation post-paper acceptance and provides details about journal-first and journal-after submission options.

infos:
Subject: ESOP 2026 - Second Call for Papers
From: SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Reply-To:SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Date:Fri, 23 May 2025 14:21:41 -0000
Content-Type:text/plain
ESOP is an annual conference devoted to fundamental issues in the specification,
ESOP 2026 features a two-round submission scheme.
ESOP 2026 solicits three forms of contributions:
The papers can be submitted here: https://esop26.hotcrp.com/
be completed by the Round 2 submission deadline.
ESOP 2026 will have a post-paper-acceptance voluntary artifact evaluation.
Authors submit their papers directly to TOPLAS before the Round 1 submission
